channel.title: How do you make a picture taker
channel.description: i need a script that will secretly take pictures and store them on my flash drive. I need to see who has been on my computer and what they have been doing. So in summary i need a script that takes pictures and stores them. ;D

item.title: How do you make a picture taker
item.dc:creator: @Codester93 Codester93
item.source: How do you make a picture taker

item.title: How do you make a picture taker
item.dc:creator: @M0rtion M0rtion
item.description:
@M0rtion wrote:

Just Have SwiftSwitch Secretly Runing nd Scar Secretly Running And Have A Script That Presses F12 Every Say 2minutes then change the save directory to your flash drive…

Heres The Script.
[scar]// Simple Screen Picture By M0rtion
//
// Have SwiftSwitch Running
// Change The First Wait Time Till How Often You Want A Pic
// Change The Save Picture Directory In Scar In >Options>Settings
// Have Fun
program PictureTakker;
//------------|
Procedure Picture;
Begin;
Wait(120000);
SendKeysVB(’{F12}’, true);
Wait(1000);
End;
//-----------|
Begin
Repeat
Picture;
Until(false)
End.[/scar]
Hope Its What You Wanted
~M0rtion

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a picture taker

item.title: How do you make a picture taker
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Well, I can make a script that will take pictures of the screen, but I’m not sure if I could make it take pictures using a webcam or anything like that, but I guess it could be possible.

So are you looking for a screen picture or a webcam picture?
